channel.title: Managing Redis on jdxj
channel.description: Recent content in Managing Redis on jdxj

item.title: Redis administration
item.description: Redis setup tips Linux 设置内核参数 vm.overcommit_memory = 1 表示 Always overcommit 写到 /etc/sysctl.conf 配置中后重启 或者直接激活 sysctl vm.overcommit_memory=1 linux的vm.overcommit_memory的内存分配参数详解 理
